potionbrewer:Accelerant.NAME: Accelerant
potionbrewer:Accelerant.DESCRIPTION: Draw cards until your hand is full. Any cards remaining in your hand at the end of turn are Exhausted.
potionbrewer:Accelerant.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw cards until your hand is full. Any cards remaining in your hand at the end of turn are Exhausted. NL Exhaust.

potionbrewer:AcidCloud.NAME: Acid Cloud
potionbrewer:AcidCloud.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If the last card played cost 0, Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies.

potionbrewer:AlchemistForm.NAME: Alchemist Form
potionbrewer:AlchemistForm.DESCRIPTION: Each turn, convert !M! gold into a random potion if you have an empty potion slot.

potionbrewer:AnotherRound.NAME: Another Round
potionbrewer:AnotherRound.DESCRIPTION: Each turn, return 1 card that costs 0 to your hand from your discard pile.
potionbrewer:AnotherRound.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate NL Each turn, return 1 card that costs 0 to your hand from your discard pile.

potionbrewer:BalancedFormula.NAME: Balanced Formula
potionbrewer:BalancedFormula.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Move a 0 cost card from your draw pile and from your discard pile to your hand.

potionbrewer:BeatDown.NAME: Beat Down
potionbrewer:BeatDown.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Place this card on top of your draw pile.

potionbrewer:BlindingMist.NAME: Blinding Mist
potionbrewer:BlindingMist.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each enemy in combat.

potionbrewer:Brandish.NAME: Brandish
potionbrewer:Brandish.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Discard all Skills drawn this way.

potionbrewer:Bribery.NAME: Bribery
potionbrewer:Bribery.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you would lose HP, pay 3 gold to lose !M! less.

potionbrewer:BrokenBeakers.NAME: Broken Beakers
potionbrewer:BrokenBeakers.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to all Enemies. Reduce this card's damage by !M! this combat.

potionbrewer:Catalyze.NAME: Catalyze
potionbrewer:Catalyze.DESCRIPTION: Use an Energy Tonic and a Swift Tonic. NL Exhaust.
potionbrewer:Catalyze.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Use an Energy Potion and a Swift Potion. NL Exhaust.

potionbrewer:CausticBarrier.NAME: Caustic Barrier
potionbrewer:CausticBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Add a *Distill to your hand.

potionbrewer:ChainReaction.NAME: Chain Reaction
potionbrewer:ChainReaction.DESCRIPTION: Each turn, shuffle a *Reaction into your draw pile.
potionbrewer:ChainReaction.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Each turn, shuffle a *Reaction into your draw pile.

potionbrewer:ChemicalShroud.NAME: Chemical Shroud
potionbrewer:ChemicalShroud.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. This costs 1 less for each potion used this combat.

potionbrewer:ChemicalSpill.NAME: Chemical Spill
potionbrewer:ChemicalSpill.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL potionbrewer:Catalyze: Gain !B! block.

potionbrewer:ChemicalWeapons.NAME: Chemical Weapons
potionbrewer:ChemicalWeapons.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Add a random *Tonic card to your hand.

potionbrewer:ChemicalRage.NAME: Chemical Rage
potionbrewer:ChemicalRage.DESCRIPTION: Each time you use a Potion, deal !M! Damage to all enemies.

potionbrewer:ChokingPowder.NAME: Choking Powder
potionbrewer:ChokingPowder.DESCRIPTION: The target takes !M! damage each time you play a card this turn.

potionbrewer:Collect.NAME: Collect
potionbrewer:Collect.DESCRIPTION: Collect a potionbrewer:Reagent from an enemy. Add a *Distill to your hand. NL Exhaust.
potionbrewer:Collect.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Collect a potionbrewer:Reagent from an enemy. Add a *Distill to your hand. NL Exhaust.

potionbrewer:CrossReference.NAME: Cross-Reference
potionbrewer:CrossReference.DESCRIPTION: Move X skills from your draw pile to your hand. They cost 0 this turn.
potionbrewer:CrossReference.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Move X + 1 skills from your draw pile to your hand. They cost 0 this turn.

potionbrewer:DigDeep.NAME: Dig Deep
potionbrewer:DigDeep.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. If the last card played cost 0, gain [E]

potionbrewer:Discombobulate.NAME: Discombobulate
potionbrewer:Discombobulate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL potionbrewer:Catalyze: The target loses !M! Strength.

potionbrewer:EmptyBottle.NAME: Empty Bottle
potionbrewer:EmptyBottle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. When you use a potion, move this from the discard pile to your hand.

potionbrewer:ExothermicReaction.NAME: Exothermic Reaction
potionbrewer:ExothermicReaction.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. If the last card played cost 0, another card costs 0 this turn.

potionbrewer:Experimentation.NAME: Experimentation
potionbrewer:Experimentation.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal NL Rotate your rightmost potionbrewer:Reagent to the far left. If you have collected 3 *reagents, create a card from them and shuffle it into your draw pile.

potionbrewer:ExplosiveReaction.NAME: Explosive Reaction
potionbrewer:ExplosiveReaction.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Sacrifice your rightmost potionbrewer:Reagent to do double damage.

potionbrewer:EyeGouge.NAME: Eye Gouge
potionbrewer:EyeGouge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Shuffle a *Reagent into your draw pile.

potionbrewer:FlareUp.NAME: Flare Up
potionbrewer:FlareUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Deal !M! more Damage for each potion played this combat.

potionbrewer:FlashPowder.NAME: Flash Powder
potionbrewer:FlashPowder.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to all enemies. NL potionbrewer:Catalyze: Draw !M! card.

potionbrewer:FollowUp.NAME: Follow Up
potionbrewer:FollowUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. If the last card played cost 0, draw a card.

potionbrewer:FuelCell.NAME: Fuel Cell
potionbrewer:FuelCell.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain [E] [E] NL Reduce energy gained from this card by 1 this combat.

potionbrewer:HazardousMaterials.NAME: Hazardous Materials
potionbrewer:HazardousMaterials.DESCRIPTION: Apply X potionbrewer:Toxic. NL potionbrewer:Catalyze: And X potionbrewer:Disease.
potionbrewer:HazardousMaterials.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Apply X potionbrewer:Toxic. NL potionbrewer:Catalyze: And X potionbrewer:Disease.

potionbrewer:HazardousWaste.NAME: Hazardous Waste
potionbrewer:HazardousWaste.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL potionbrewer:Catalyze: Permanently increase Poison by 1. NL Exhaust.
potionbrewer:HazardousWaste.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Apply !M! Poison. NL potionbrewer:Catalyze: Permanently increase Poison by 2. NL Exhaust.

potionbrewer:Hoarder.NAME: Hoarder
potionbrewer:Hoarder.DESCRIPTION: Each turn, add a *Reagent to your draw pile.
potionbrewer:Hoarder.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate NL Each turn, add a *Reagent to your draw pile.

potionbrewer:IronFist.NAME: Iron Fist
potionbrewer:IronFist.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL potionbrewer:Catalyze: Strength affects this !M! times.

potionbrewer:IronFlesh.NAME: Iron Flesh
potionbrewer:IronFlesh.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !B! Block next turn.

potionbrewer:IronHeart.NAME: Iron Heart
potionbrewer:IronHeart.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! percent more Block when playing cards that grant Block.

potionbrewer:LeftoverSpecimen.NAME: Leftover Specimen
potionbrewer:LeftoverSpecimen.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a *Reagent card into your hand. NL Exhaust.
potionbrewer:LeftoverSpecimen.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a *Reagent card into your hand.

potionbrewer:MicrobeSpray.NAME: Microbe Spray
potionbrewer:MicrobeSpray.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and !M! potionbrewer:Infection to all enemies. NL Exhaust.

potionbrewer:OneTwoPunch.NAME: One-Two Punch
potionbrewer:OneTwoPunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. If the last card played cost 0, play this twice.

potionbrewer:PortableLab.NAME: Portable Lab
potionbrewer:PortableLab.DESCRIPTION: Consume any leftover energy after each turn. When !M! energy is consumed, add a *Potion *Card to your hand.

potionbrewer:PotentialEnergy.NAME: Potential Energy
potionbrewer:PotentialEnergy.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal NL Whenever you gain Strength or Dexterity, gain !M! more.
potionbrewer:PotentialEnergy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Strength or Dexterity, gain !M! more.

potionbrewer:PrivateReserves.NAME: Private Reserves
potionbrewer:PrivateReserves.DESCRIPTION: Each time you use a Potion, gain !M! block.

potionbrewer:QuickStep.NAME: Quick Step
potionbrewer:QuickStep.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If you've played less than !M! cards this turn, draw a card.

potionbrewer:RefinedProcess.NAME: Refined Process
potionbrewer:RefinedProcess.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage !M! times. NL potionbrewer:Catalyze: Permanently increase this card's damage by 1 and exhaust it.

potionbrewer:ResearchResults.NAME: Research Results
potionbrewer:ResearchResults.DESCRIPTION: Generate and use X random potions.
potionbrewer:ResearchResults.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Generate and use X + 1 random potions.

potionbrewer:Smokescreen.NAME: Smokescreen
potionbrewer:Smokescreen.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL potionbrewer:Catalyze: Draw a card.

potionbrewer:SpecialFormula.NAME: Special Formula
potionbrewer:SpecialFormula.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of !M! random potions to obtain. NL Exhaust.

potionbrewer:TestFormula.NAME: Test Formula
potionbrewer:TestFormula.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of !M! random potionbrewer:Tonics to use immediately.

potionbrewer:TestSubject.NAME: Test Subject
potionbrewer:TestSubject.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL potionbrewer:Catalyze: Apply !M! potionbrewer:Infection.

potionbrewer:TheFinalStraw.NAME: The Final Straw
potionbrewer:TheFinalStraw.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! percent of the target's missing HP.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL !M! percent of the target's missing HP.

potionbrewer:Transmute.NAME: Transmute
potionbrewer:Transmute.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. If this kills a non-minion enemy, choose 1 of 3 random potions to obtain.

potionbrewer:TwoForOne.NAME: Two For One
potionbrewer:TwoForOne.DESCRIPTION: Obtain another copy of the next Potion you use. NL Exhaust.

potionbrewer:UnstableFormula.NAME: Unstable Formula
potionbrewer:UnstableFormula.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Next turn, deal !D! Damage.

potionbrewer:VolatileSolution.NAME: Volatile Solution
potionbrewer:VolatileSolution.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. No cards will trigger their potionbrewer:Catalyze effects this turn.

potionbrewer:WizBang.NAME: Wiz Bang
potionbrewer:WizBang.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage 2 times. NL potionbrewer:Catalyze: 3 times.

potionbrewer:Prototype.NAME: Prototype Potion
potionbrewer:Prototype.DESCRIPTION: Has various effects based on the Reagents collected.

potionbrewer:Reaction.NAME: Reaction
potionbrewer:Reaction.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, gain [E] and draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

potionbrewer:Distill.NAME: Distill
potionbrewer:Distill.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Brew your rightmost potionbrewer:Reagent into a potion over 3 turns. NL Exhaust.

potionbrewer:ReagentCard.NAME: Reagent
potionbrewer:ReagentCard.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random potionbrewer:Reagent to collect.
